about_the_game:
Halloween 3 Book

This Halloween themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! It's the spooky season again!

Contents

The Halloween 3 book unlocks the following images:

  • Spider - 37x60
  • Zombie Hand - 38x49
  • Flaming Skull - 39x49
  • Sorcerer - 44x58
  • Little Ghost - 49x66
  • Doll - 50x43
  • Scarecrow - 60x68
  • Bat - 77x57
  • Witch - 82x82
  • Skeleton - 95x95
  • RIP - 96x58
  • Jack O' Lantern - 97x117
  • Winged - 100x55
  • Eye - 100x65
  • Pumpkin - 120x100
  • Succubus - 130x259
  • Ghost - 177x99
  • Full Moon - 185x185
  • Crooked House - 240x150
  • Trick or Treat - 300x125

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Halloween 3 Pack

  • DirectX: Version 12

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

short_description: Unlocks the third Halloween themed book for Coloring Pixels! Includes 20 new Halloween pixel art pages to complete. Get in the Halloween spirit...If you dare!
